snippet: The Czechoslovak-American Marionette Theater uses Plato’s texts as a basis for “The Republic, or Dinner With Socrates,” at La MaMa E.T.C.
abstract: Catherine Rampell reviews Czechoslovak-American Marionette Theater production of Vit Horejs adaptation The Republic, or Dinner With Socrates at La MaMa E T C.
lead_paragraph: The Czechoslovak-American Marionette Theater uses Plato’s texts as a basis for “The Republic, or Dinner With Socrates,” at La MaMa E.T.C.

headline.seo: ‘The Republic, or My Dinner With Socrates,’ at La MaMa
headline.kicker: Theater Review | 'The Republic, or Dinner With Socrates'
